# Welcome to the Stan Project!

## Open-Source Software for Statistical Modeling

Stan combines powerful statistical modeling capabilities, an active community, and a commitment to open-source development.

Interfaces for Python, Julia, R, and the Unix shell make it easy to use Stan in any programming environment,
from laptops, clusters, or the cloud.
